ygData.subject: Re: Zimel's Blades
ygData.msgSnippet: From my experiences, Tykar comes in about twice a day.  One time he stays for a while, at least 5 minutes, the other time he is there for only about 30
ygData.messageBody:
From my experiences, Tykar comes in about twice a day. One time he stays
for a while, at least 5 minutes, the other time he is there for only about
30 seconds. I used to spend a lot of time there, and found that going in
around midnight and waiting was the best plan. However, seeing as they have
changed almost everything else in this quest (spawn rates and such) this all
could have changed.

About the bartender not selling to you, I have not has this problem, but
will check around to see if someone has found a way to get him on your good
side.

Avron wrote:

> From: Avron <avron@...>
>
> I am in the part of the quest where I am supposed to meet Tykar Renlin
> in the Seafarers Roost inn, but I have searched it thouroughly and he
> was not there, does he only come at a certain time or do I need to do
> something to make him come?
> Also my faction with the innkeepers is so that I cannot trade with them,
> I am KOS by freeport militia aswell, and this has REALLY made the quest
> hard to do, I don't even want to think about how I am supposed to get
> into the dungeon and meet Zimel hehe. But I guess this is all easy
> compared to the other two pieces of the quest heh..
>
> - Avron Elselynn - Solusek Ro

--
-Sir Vawhn, Knight of Truth, Silver
Cazic-Thule server
